department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Qualified Organization needed for Combustion Mercury Analyzer + Delivery, Installation, Training and Maintenance
description: PWGSC (Public Works and Government Services) requested a team of professionals able to deliver Combustion Mercury Analyzer + Training + Maintenance + Installation in Montréal via an RFQ ( Request for Qualification )
full_summary:
=================
## Abbé Mercure Analysis

### Request for Proposal (RFP)
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing this Request for Proposal (RFP) on behalf of Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC) for the acquisition of a Combustion Mercury Analyzer and related services.

### Tender Details

* **Reference Number:** WS4252682063 4275174052
* **Publication Date:** 2023-11-17
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-12-12 14:00:00
* **Procurement Category:** Government of Canada (GD)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive, Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

### Trade Agreements
This procurement is open to suppliers who are eligible to participate under the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

### Regions of Opportunity and Delivery
This tender opportunity is located in Montréal, Québec, Canada.

### Contracting Entity
The contracting entity is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC).

### Contact Information
For any queries or to obtain the tender package, please contact:
Hassen Aroune
(TPSGC/PSPC)
hassen.aroune@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Tender Package
The tender package may be downloaded in electronic format from the following website:
https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18041923?extsite=MTgwNDE5MjNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

### Note
The deadline for submission of the tender package is 2023-12-12 14:00:00.
